definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

sentences.english: State media reported that Shahram Amiri was asking for a quick return to Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗国家媒体报导说，阿米里要求迅速返回德黑兰。

sentences.english: A city of southwest-central Iran south-southeast of Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 设拉子伊朗中西南部一城市，在德黑兰西南偏南。

sentences.english: Four post-election trials have been held at Branch 15 of the Revolutionary Court in Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 选举后有四个审判是在德黑兰革命法庭第15科举行。

sentences.english: Vahid is typical of young Tehran consumers.
sentences.chinese: 瓦希德是典型的德黑兰消费者。

sentences.english: There's a mist covering Tehran right now.
sentences.chinese: 现在德黑兰已经被厚厚的雾覆盖住了。

sentences.english: It also seeks to influence the decisions being made in Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 同时也是在试图对德黑兰的决定施加影响。

sentences.english: The aircraft was traveling from Tehran to the Armenian capital of Yerevan.
sentences.chinese: 该班机由伊朗首都德黑兰飞往亚美尼亚首都埃里温。

sentences.english: Why all this fuss? A water fight among playful youth at a water park.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗年轻人在德黑兰一个公园里打水仗。

sentences.english: He said Tehran might be ready to return to negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 他说，德黑兰也许已做好重返谈判桌的准备。

sentences.english: The group said it wanted to re-establish dialogue with Tehran on a nuclear swap proposal that was introduced last year.
sentences.chinese: 该组织说，他们希望于德黑兰就核交换议案重建对话。

sentences.english: More mosques are in it now, say the Serbs, than in Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 塞尔维亚人说，现在这里的清真寺比德黑兰的还要多。

sentences.english: LOS ANGELES — Two mullahs gaze out on a crowd of protesters in Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 在德黑兰，两位高僧向外注视着一群示威者。

sentences.english: The tri- partite summit was held in Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 三国峰会在德黑兰举行。

sentences.english: "Tehran was a good joke, " she says, through a choked throat .
sentences.chinese: “德黑兰开了一个很有趣的玩笑，”她嗓音哽噎地说。

sentences.english: Derakhshan had returned to Tehran three weeks ago.
sentences.chinese: Derakhshan是于3个星期前返回德黑兰的。

sentences.english: Since then, Tehran had insisted that enrichment was non-negotiable.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，德黑兰就坚持说铀浓缩是不可谈的问题。

definition: Tabriz city in northwest Iran, capital of Iranian East Azerbaijan
Isfahan or Eşfahān, province and city in central Iran
